Name: Choco Pixel 3
About the game: Choco Pixel 3 is a minimalist colorful puzzle which goal is to get the toy car to the finish using 4 directions in space avoiding traps and choosing the right directions to avoid dead ends. In Choco Pixel 3: - Traps - Chocolate - Sweets - Cool music - 50 levels - Pixel art
